product_name: Delta Cycle Michelangelo Gravity Bike Storage Stand
long_description: The Michelangelo Gravity stand from Delta Cycle is a convenient bike stand that holds 2 bikes without taking up much space at all. Independently adjustable arms accommodate nearly any bike style. Easy assembly; all tools are included. Premium-quality powder-coat finish. Maximum load: 80 pounds.
short_description: The Michelangelo Gravity stand from Delta Cycle is a convenient bike stand that holds 2 bikes without taking up much space at all.
